description:
This course comprehends the right and wrong actions taken when open a new business to see the big picture why them either succeed or fail. These two perspectives will allow you to identify the right things and avoid the most common mistakes. This course focus in the following aspects:

Know your business. More specific know who your customers are, what they want, what their problems are and how your product or service solve those problems.

Develop a better product. Create a strong bond with the customer and your product or service. The sense of belonging should come from your product to customer not the other way.

Know how to compete and dominate. At the beginning everything is against you, nobody knows you, your company or sometimes the product or service you are selling. This is why you will learn how to dominate since day 1.

By taking this course you will gain the materials and tools necessary to create and run your business such as: finance workbooks, business plan template, legal, project, and management tools.
title: Real Entrepreneurship: From legal structure up first sale
